name: happy-hour
effect: Doubles prize money. Stacks with a held item. Only works once per battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.
